phase_run.description: You are fast and hard to see. If you end this buff by making a weapon attack, that attack will do more damage

curse_temporal_chains.name: Temporal Chains
curse_temporal_chains.description: You are cursed. Time passes more slowly for you.

curse_elemental_weakness.name: Elemental Weakness
curse_elemental_weakness.description: You are cursed. You take more Elemental damage.

curse_fire_weakness.name: Flammability
curse_fire_weakness.description: You are cursed. You take more Fire damage and are more prone to being Ignited.

curse_cold_weakness.name: Frostbite
curse_cold_weakness.description: You are cursed. You take more Cold damage and are more prone to being Frozen.

curse_lightning_weakness.name: Conductivity
curse_lightning_weakness.description: You are cursed. You take more Lightning damage and are more prone to being Shocked.

curse_warlords_mark.name: Warlord's Mark
curse_warlords_mark.description: You are cursed. You will be Stunned more often and for longer, grant Mana and Life Leech to enemies, and have a chance to grant an Endurance charge when killed.

curse_punishment.name: Punishment
curse_punishment.description: You are cursed. You are dealt a percentage of the Physical Damage you deal.

curse_enfeeble.name: Enfeeble
curse_enfeeble.description: You are cursed. You deal less damage, are less likely to hit, and are less likely to critical strike.

curse_assassins_mark.name: Assassin's Mark
curse_assassins_mark.description: You are cursed. You are more likely to be critically hit, take more damage from critical hits, grant life and mana when killed, and have a chance to grant a power charge when killed.

curse_projectile_weakness.name: Projectile Weakness
curse_projectile_weakness.description: You are cursed. You are easier to knock back, and for projectiles to pierce. You take more damage from projectiles.

curse_vulnerability.name: Vulnerability
curse_vulnerability.description: You are cursed. You take increased physical damage, and attacks against you have a chance to inflict Maim or Bleeding.

curse_poachers_mark.name: Poacher's Mark
curse_poachers_mark.description: You are cursed. You have less Evasion, grant life and mana to enemies that attack you, provide extra flask charges when killed and have a chance to grant a frenzy charge when killed

curse_newpunishment.name: Punishment
curse_newpunishment.description: You are cursed. Your melee attacks against enemies apply a buff to them, granting more melee damage and attack speed.

CarlsTestCheat.description: You are testing the game with raw stats and blanket mods. You should never see this outside of Grinding Gear Games.

corpse_devour_storm.name: Devouring Tempest

projectile_nova_storm.name: Sharding Tempest

veil_storm.name: Veiling Tempest

drop_as_sell_price_storm.name: Transmogrifying Tempest
